alert.note: Alert for Comerio; Corozal; Morovis; Naranjito; Toa Alta (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 22 at 2:31PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Comerio, Corozal, Morovis, Naranjito and Toa Alta. * WHEN...Until 430 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 131 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Corozal, Naranjito, Morovis, Toa Alta, Comerio, H. Rivera Colon, Galateo, Pajaros, Franquez, Barahona, Palomas and Mucarabones. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Comerio; Corozal; Morovis; Naranjito; Toa Alta
